name: Submission New
message:
Hi, thanks for starting a listing with us. I am here to help - just ask. When your listing is ready submit for approval. For more info on how to complete your listing see here: https://sdq.st/submit
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Submission Approval No
message:
Hi, thanks for starting a listing with us. I am here to help- just ask. You have submitted for approval however your listing is not ready just yet. Please add a download link. I recommend Github however Dropbox will work if you change the end of the link to dl=1. For more info on how to complete your listing see here: https://sdq.st/submit  Submit for approval when ready.
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Approval N
message:
Hi, You have submitted for approval however your listing is not ready just yet. Please add a download link. I recommend Github however Dropbox will work if you change the end of the link to dl=1. Update the link, SAVE and submit for approval when complete. For more info on how to complete your listing see here: https://sdq.st/submit  
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Submission Approval Y
message:
Hi, thanks for listing with us.  I am here to help- just ask.  I have pre-approved your app. You are now in control and you can choose to publish, use the Early Access system or share privately using keys. If you plan to publish then tag any hype about your app @sidequestvr on Twitter and we will share. Also use #virtualreality #oculusquest in posts as bots retweet these. Check out our new Promotion system for Homepage Banners and Infill Ads - https://sdq.st/promote  
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Approval Y
message:
Hi, I have pre-approved your app. You are now in control and you can choose to publish, use the Early Access system or keep private. 
 For more info on how we can help you promote your app visit: https://sidequestvr.atlassian.net/l/c/3QLXTxbV 
 To discuss any of these opportunities join the Dev Discord and dm @orlaharris - https://sdq.st/devdiscord  
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Dropbox DL1
message:
Hi, One quick note before we can test, please change the end of the Dropbox link to dl=1 to make it a direct download.  Update the link, SAVE and submit for approval when complete. For more info see here: https://sdq.st/submit 
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Dropbox Error
message:
Hi, Unfortunately your Dropbox link is producing an error. Please check and update the link.  Update the link, SAVE and submit for approval when complete.  For more info see here: https://sdq.st/submit 
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Google Drive
message:
Hi, thanks for listing with us. Unfortunately we cannot integrate with Google Drive. I recommend Github however Dropbox will work if you change the end of the link to dl=1.  Update the link, SAVE and submit for approval when complete. For more info see here: https://sdq.st/submit 
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Unknown Drive
message:
Hi, thanks for listing with us. Unfortunately we cannot integrate with the download link you have provided. I recommend Github however Dropbox will work if you change the end of the link to dl=1.  Update the link, SAVE and submit for approval when complete. For more info see here: https://sdq.st/submit 
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Approval Itch N
message:
Hi, Thanks for listing with us. One quick note, please add the Itch URL under Donate URLS and remove from direct downloads.  Update the link, SAVE and submit for approval when complete.  If this is a paid game please also send a key so I can test the installation. More info here: https://sdq.st/submit 
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Itch Key
message: Hi, thanks for listing with us. As this is a paid app can you please share an Itch key and I will test the installation. Thanks.

name: Itch Public
message: Hi, Quick note, it looks like your Itch page is private. Check these instructions to make your Itch page live: From the project's Edit page on ITCH, scroll to the Visibility & Access section located on the bottom and select the Public option. After saving your page, your project is published. Once you have completed this, submit for approval. Thanks

name: Promote
message:
Hi, For more info on how we can help you promote your app visit: https://sidequestvr.atlassian.net/l/c/3QLXTxbV 
 To discuss any of these opportunities join the Dev Discord and dm @orlaharris - https://sdq.st/devdiscord  
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Claim An App
message: Hi, thanks for reaching out. In order to prove you are the developer, would you mind sending me an email orla@sidequestvr.com - with a screen shot of the top of your Oculus Dashboard. We just need that to verify then I can transition the app to your account. Thanks!

name: Unclaimed App User Message
message: Hi There, it looks like the Developer has not claimed this listing so they won't receive your messages. Thanks

name: Broken Link
message:
Hi, it looks like your link has stopped working / has been removed.  We have temporarily unapproved the listed. Please update the link and submit for approval when ready so we can check and pre-approve. 
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: Duplicate App Lab
message:
Hi There, it looks like someone submitted your App Lab game to Sidequest but you also have an active listing.  We have unapproved the duplicate listing so you can now add your App Lab link to your current listing under the 'integrations tab' in 'Manage'. You can choose to remove your sideload link or keep it. 
 For more info on how we can help you promote your app visit: https://sidequestvr.atlassian.net/l/c/3QLXTxbV 
 To discuss any of these opportunities join the Dev Discord and dm @orlaharris - https://sdq.st/devdiscord  
 https://sdq.st/a/

name: App Transfer Complete
message:
Hi There, I have now transferred the app to you. You are now in control. 
 For more info on how we can help you promote your app visit: https://sidequestvr.atlassian.net/l/c/3QLXTxbV 
 To discuss any of these opportunities join the Dev Discord and dm @orlaharris - https://sdq.st/devdiscord  
 
 https://sdq.st/a/
